alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Eastland (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Eastland and Comanche Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1130 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rising Star, or 20 miles northwest of Comanche, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Comanche, De Leon, Rising Star, Proctor Lake, Comyn, Sabanno, Proctor, Hasse, Sidney, Okra, Duster, Downing, Rucker, Pioneer, Van Dyke, Beattie and Sipe Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central and north central Texas.
